ValidationRule.description: Fund Transactions cannot be edited within Budget Management module, when reference to Multi-Fund Transaction exists.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE , AND(NOT(ISNULL(cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__c)) , OR(ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__c ) , ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template__c ) , ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Source_Fund__c ), AND(ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Status__c ) , TEXT(cgcloud__Status__c) != TEXT(cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__r.cgcloud__Status__c)))))
